Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, south of the Iilandi Family Mansion.
Room.LongDescription: The large Iilandi Family Estate and Mansion can be seen to the north of Hillcrest Drive. The Iilandi Family owns much of the producing land in Oceancrest including the Richland Orchard and the Klondike Wheat Fields. They also hold some stock in some of the smaller productions in town, as well as some political offices here and there.
